SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_house_count (id, house_id, click_num, collect_num, inform_num) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{houseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clickNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{informNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select t.id as t_id, t.house_id as t_house_id, t.click_num as t_click_num, t.collect_num as t_collect_num, t.inform_num as t_inform_num from t_house_count t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select t.id as t_id, t.house_id as t_house_id, t.click_num as t_click_num, t.collect_num as t_collect_num, t.inform_num as t_inform_num from t_house_count t
select t.id as t_id, t.house_id as t_house_id, t.click_num as t_click_num, t.collect_num as t_collect_num, t.inform_num as t_inform_num from t_house_count t
select t.id as t_id, t.house_id as t_house_id, t.click_num as t_click_num, t.collect_num as t_collect_num, t.inform_num as t_inform_num from t_house_count t
select count(1) as totalNum from t_house_count t
mapper.insert: insert into t_house_count (id, house_id, click_num, collect_num, inform_num) values #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.houseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.clickNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.collectNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.informNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
